content.content: Snakeybus is an arcade game that requires a balance between reflexes and forethought. Weave through the city streets and pick up as many passengers as you can. Drop your passengers at their destinations to cash in. The more people you drop off, the more your bus grows in length. Play smart and avoid crashing into yourself!
To follow the dev-progress, chat with the community or test the game: Join us on discord.gg/Xu4g8kd.

content.jumbo: Be updated or eligible for demo keys
content.content: We will notify you only for releases, updates, big announcements. Demo keys are distributed through random lottery using this mailing list.
